attributes.action: acknowledge publicly that golliwogs give children and adults of all races and creeds pleasure, that good cheer is in short supply these days and if gollies can improve things they must be a good thing, and that the dreary humourless forces of political correctness that have crawled out of the woodwork on this issue should be challenged as often as possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current controversy over golliwogs has led to people being fired, shops being emptied of gollies, and a horrible Puritan finger-pointing.

Gollies give people pleasure and create happiness. Most people are fed up with the politically correct zealots who endeavour to spread their gloom everywhere they go.

Please sign the petition, as a small challenge to their dreariness.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
